11.title: Toddler (2-5)

choices: Make Them Make Him Some More Giant Pull Ups
111.content: Matthew is called Matt for short. He is 4 years old, wears Pull Ups, and is very hyper! He is kind of quiet, but very hyper! He came into the city with his eyes all wide, eager to explore and play with his new toys. But apparently, that's not what everyone in the city wanted. Matt knew that because everyone started to run away when they saw this 100 foot tall, toddler come into their city. He was wearing nothing but his blue Pull Ups diaper and a plain white shirt. "Stop running from me!" Shouted out Matt very angry at his new toys. No one stopped running so Matt got very mad. He began walking down the street purposely raising his giant feet every time and making sure to send pain through their tiny little bodies while continuing to crush them in the process. After that little rampage, what does he do next with these people?
111.title: Giant Matthew

1111.content: Matt feels his stomach growl, and he feels a bit hungry . He lick his lips as he looks at his new toys, and decided to eat them. As he grabbed one it started to wiggle and scream. He placed it in his mouth and swalows. He heard the others scream in fear. He shouted for them to stop, but they didn't . He kept on eating them in anger, crushing them between his teeth. When he was full, he started to vibrate.
1111.title: Eat Some

choices: Kill the survivors at his feet.
11111.content:
As Matt felt himself vibrating, he felt a surge of energy rush throughout his body. Suddenly, he began growing again! This time he reached thirty feet tall, and felt even more godlike as he looked down at his feet. Some of the individuals that he hadn't gobbled up had been squashed under his much heavier (and larger) feet.

"Awesome!" He hollered in delight.
11111.title: Grows to 30 feet.

choices: Make him meet another toddler his size
111111.content: After Matt trspped them he began to grow even more and his diaper finally burst he was a naked giant boy
111111.title: Kill the survivors at his feet.

choices: Matt tries to befriend the gigantic fat baby monster
1111111.content:
It was sometime after Matt grew even more along with his diaper finally bursting that Matt was about to meet another toddler or baby that was the same size as him in other words a gigantic fat baby monster.

The gigantic fat baby monster was heavily waddling towards the city itself as it already left a path of destruction behind him as the gigantic fat baby monster stopped at the city's city limits as he took off his giant sized Huggies giant fat movers diaper.

"Me gigantic fat baby take off giant sized Huggies giant fat movers diaper." The gigantic fat baby monster roared.

The gigantic fat baby monster then took off his giant sized Huggies giant fat movers diaper as it hit the ground with a thud.

"Me feel better already now me terrorize big city bare butt naked." The gigantic fat baby monster once again roared.
1111111.title: Make him meet another toddler his size

choices: Crawl over the side of wall.
Jump over the side of the wall.
Fuck the wall, smash right through it!
1112.content:
As Matt pressed the last little person in sight flat under his big toe, he discovered that crushing these little pests like bugs was really fun! Twisting the ball of his foot from side to side, he mangled the already crushed corpses stuck to his foot and savored the little squishy noises they made. Matt took another stroll down the street, looking for more people he could step on. Approaching another intersection, Matt comes across a couple bugs making a last-ditch effort to escape from him. The giant boy obviously isn't having this, and before either of them could get very far his foot was casting them in its' shadow. Just as soon as their world went dark, Matt stomped them flat into goo underneath his heel and giggled.

"There has to be more somewhere!" Matt huffed in frustration.

No sooner than he had said that, the giant turned his left and noticed what appeared to be a stadium right up the road. The brown-haired giant kid squatted down and began to crawl on all fours, wanting to do his best at sneaking up on his prey. Like a tiger. Upon reaching the stadium, Matt peered over the edge just enough to get a good look at the current game that was unfolding. It looked like a soccer match, and the roofless building was crammed full of people!

The giant boy wanting absolutely nobody to escape his games this time around. Stooping back down and crawling on all fours again, the giant boy grabbed a nearby abandoned box-truck and tipped it over so that it would be covering the main entrance to the stadium. Crawling around to the backside of the stands, he squashed several people flat under he hands and knees as he waded carelessly through the parking lot. The back entrance of the stadium was a little more crowded with fans. A couple kids, and a couple irritated parents smoking cigarettes and trying to keep their children from running out into the street. Matt hadn't been spotted just yet, but as he crawled closer, he grabbed the largest pickup truck he could find and smashed it in front of the doors with glee. All those who had been standing outside were crushed into the sidewalk, and the giant kid watched as their blood began to flow into the drainpipe down the street.

Now that that's taken care of, Matt can finally have fun with the rest of the stadium-goers. He decides to...
1112.title: Crush some more.

choices: Those in the box-seats on the other side of the stadium.
11121.content:
Deciding to make his entrance rather quiet, the giant boy put two enormous hands on top of the wall and stood up to his full height. Hoisting himself over the side, he was a little surprised that the whole thing didn't fall down. The giant set himself atop his knees that were resting on the edge of the wall. He smiled as everything stopped to look at him. Even the announcer had stopped himself mid-sentence. The game had stopped. Everyone was staring at this giant, diaper-clad four-year-old boy who was now sitting in the bleachers like an average fan. The kid had shifted himself down, and sat directly on top of multiple families and other terrified stadium-goers. He felt several pops beneath his butt and giggled happily.

"Hi everyone!" The boy said, waving.

The stadium turned into a madhouse as the first few drops of blood from the people he was sitting on ran down the bleacher stairs and onto the field. People screamed and began to make way for the exits. The giant boy just giggled at their efforts. These people would have nowhere to run to. Deciding to take it slow, the giant stood back up and brushed off his diapered rear with indifference. A couple people who had simply stuck to his oversized Pampers fell to their doom as he brushed them off.

Now, who should he target first?
11121.title: Crawl over the side of wall.

111212.content:
Matt decided to start with the little people in the bright green and blue uniforms. They looked like great little snacks, almost like candy treats. Raising a foot into the air, he brought it down in a heavy stomp on top of the bleachers (and a few unfortunate people who were unable to move quickly enough). The bleachers collapsed below his gigantic footfalls. Since Matt was so big, the drop of the fall to him was less than a few inches. Those who had chosen to hide underneath of the stadium seats as opposed to running away were squished as the weight of an enormous tot on top of the many bleacher seats came down on their heads.

Giggling at all of the carnage he was causing with glee, Matt began his march onward onto the field. Surprisingly, a good majority of the stadium had managed to run away to the other side. Those left before his toes were either just beginning to get a grip enough to run away, or those who were injured from his previous destructions.

The teams had stuck together, albeit separated into their colors. The green team was the closest on the far left hand side of the oval-shaped stadium, while the blue team had managed to run all the way down to the right side of the field. The giant boy's tummy growled in anticipation.

The only question is, which one looks like a tastier snack?
111212.title: The players of the teams.

choices: Enjoyed the snack and continued eating.
Didn't like it, plans something else for the team.
1112121.content:
Surveying the crowd in front of him, Matt pondered happily and rested his hands on his hips. Green was his favorite color, so he figured he would start with them. Taking a couple steps forward, he felt a couple bodies of those injured from all of the chaos pop under a foot. Anyone caught under his next few strides were instantly turned to mush as he approached the green team.

"Hi!" He giggled, waving down at the bright-colored team cowering before him. They looked as good as jolly ranchers.

Sitting down in front of them, their world shook as the oversized boy simply sat before them. Matt extended his legs outward, forming a barrier around the small team and trapping them before him. Those in the front were only several inches from the biggest diaper they had ever seen, and as the boy stared, licking his lips, it foreshadowed their future. A panic broke out amongst the team as they frantically tried to scramble up the sides of his legs. A couple even attempted the mountainous climb of his diaper. All was in vain as the boy simple swatted them back amongst their fellow mates, where they would be subject to gripping fingers as he began to reach for them. Picking up one by his arm, he looked him over while he struggled.

"Down the hatch!" Matt exclaimed, raising the squirming captive above his maw. He dangled him there for a second, giggling happily at his pleas for mercy before dropping him in and closing his lips. Matt swished him around for a moment, gazing down at the terrified snacks between his legs. When the struggles in his mouth began to slow, the giant tot rolled him over a molar with his tongue and abruptly ceased any movement with a crunch before swallowing.

Matt...
1112121.title: The green team.

1113.content:
Matthew was happy after squishing several little people. He looked down and saw several dozen people near him running away. “I have an idea for you toys”. He shoved a building in front of them. The building collapsed to the ground. A few of the unfortunate people in the front were crushed as the building fell. The rubble coved the entire street. The people were trapped between a building’s rubble and a giant toddler’s feet. The people screamed as they were at the mercy of Matthew

Matthew smiled at his ‘toys. He turned around and sat down on crowd. The people screamed as the pull-up came down to the ground. There was a loud crunch as several people were squished beneath his pull-up. He giggled at the feeling of the bugs being crushed and as their blood stained the back of his pull-up. He got up a little bit and sat back down. Several more little bugs were squished beneath him. The last his victims saw was the blue pull-up before they were turned into pancakes. He grabbed the last 10 people and shoved them into the back of his pull-up. He giggled again at the feeling of people squirming inside his diaper.
He liked the feeling of having people inside his diaper, so he went to find more people. He stood up and started walking again. He found another group of people. He scooped up another 10 people and shoved them inside as well. The rest started running away screaming. Matthew just smiled and started stomping after them. Each step he took left a giant footprint in the street. When he caught up to the back of the group of people, he scooped up more people. He kept shoving people into his diaper until there were over 80 people. The squirming of his toys were really tickling him.

Then he felt a familiar feeling inside him. He saw that there was a building that was about waist level to him. He walked over to the building and ripped of the roof. The little people inside were terrified at the sight of this giant toddler. He turned around and sat down on the building. They started screaming when they saw the blood stained diaper right above them. Matthew smiled and looked down at his pull-up. The front was started to bulge out as it absorbed his piss. He started grunting and pushing. Both people inside and outside the diaper were screaming. Then there was a loud fart. The people in the building and in his pull-up were gagging. Matthew was giggling at the fun he was having. A massive turd poked out of his butt and fell into the seat of his pull-up. This caused the back to bulge a little bit. Several more turds crashed into his diaper. Everyone inside the diaper was dead.

Then the building started to creak. The people inside could see cracks forming along the walls. They knew what was happening and screamed. The building collapsed into a pile of rubble. There was a loud crunch as the people inside the diaper were crushed. Matthew looked down and giggled at the sight of his used and blood stained pull-up.

He yelled for the remaining people to make him some new pull-ups. The people were terrified of what he would do if they didn’t. They got some materials and got to work. Matthew was getting tired. He let out a big yawn and rubbed his eyes. He lay down, crushing a couple more buildings. He giggled at causing more destruction and fell asleep.

He woke up after a full night’s sleep. He sat back up and found the people making him pull-ups. They had finished a dozen blue pull-ups for him. They told them to change him or they could be squished like the others.

The people obeyed and told him to lie down. He lay down on the street and spread his legs so it would be easier for the people to change him. Amazingly, he didn’t cause any damage. The people slid a clean pull-up beneath him. A few climbed up the pull-up and undid the tabs. When it fell down, some screamed and others gagged. The sight of the crushed people mixed with the smell of human waste was horrible. They kept going and used the old pull-up to clean him up as best they could. Then they finished cleaning him with a few wipes. They put the wipes in the pull-up and folded it in half. They got some cranes and pulled the diaper to the city dump. They put on some baby powder. They finished changing him by pulling the front to his waist and did up the Velcro on the pull-up tight.
When Matthew felt the pull-up on him, he sat up. He looked over his pull-up and smiled. “Good job wittle bugs”. He sat there wondering what to do with these people.
1113.title: Pull-up Makers

12.title: Kid (6-10)

121.content:
Luke was having the time of his life,he was a giant in his dreams and a bright light shone above.A voice called to him.
"Luke,Luke,I am an alien from another galaxy and i am going to make you what you have always dreamed of".
"A giant!!!!!!!"
"Yes,now here is what we will do,you will grow to the height you want,you can change that height at will,we need you to destroy all the armies of the world,so we can conquer your world,it will take several years for us to get there so you will rule the earth until our arrival".
"Cool".
You will begin now".
Luke wakes up
How tall is he?
121.title: Mercy of Luke

1212.content:
The shinning light was gone and Luke may have the strangest dream he ever have of his life so far. He thought there was still nothing that an alien would make that happen to his fantasy dream and thought that was his obsessed moment. he woke up soon-after, much as feeling tired that his eyes weren't clear as of yet. But then it did however by rubbing it to have a better look, something's not right there.

The first thing he notice was it was still shinning above him, that's when he realized he wasn't in his bedroom at all. He didn't feel his bed at all and felt rough from where he lay down. That's when he wanted to sit up and find the reasons why he wasn't where he was? At first, he was looking at the sky like he was in the middle of nowhere, but Luke heard small noises surrounded him and looked down to find out, and his expressions was nothing but shocked to what has happened? He's now a giant in real life.

"Wow! This is true! An alien did make me grow big, and I'm not a giant kid!" A smiling seven year old, Luke as he looked around his streets he's sits on and seeing how small all of it are, and he's massively bigger at 200 feet tall, much to his delight from his cute face. He was still in pajamas though, but didn't mind wearing them since nothing else fits him.

He loves having fun with things he imagined and it was time to get cracking for a giant kid and as he stood up and heads to his first destination he approaches the nearest from his house. But where was it he goes to?
1212.title: Dreams Happened for Luke

12132.content:
Luke woke up:
"Man that was an awesome dream!" he said but as he sat up and looked around he didn't see his bedroom. He was confused at first but then an idea came to him.

Luke looked down and saw tiny houses

"Holy crap I'm HUGE!" he said as he got up his feet

He then remembered what the alien said to him in his dream, he need to take over the world.

Well that shouldn't be too hard at this size he thought

Luke then began to walk to the nearest city.
12132.title: 3 miles

choices: Everything! The city is a barren wasteland by the time hes done with it!
Almost everything! But Luke leaves some standing to make a power display!
121321.content:
The ground beneath Luke's soles was like squishy clay as he walked towards the city. At his height, the world was a great green carpet with little "patches" of city here and there. The largest cities he could see in the distance had some depth to them, with their tiny spires maybe ankle high to him. Suddenly he felt a little "crunch!" under his foot and he halted mid step, keeping his foot planted firmly on the ground. Almost nervously, he lifted the massive stomper off the ground, the earth reluctantly letting go of his foot. Luke had been a big kid for his age standing in at 4'4", letting him wrestle and rough house with kids two years older than him. As a result, his feet had been size 4.5 which amplified to his height were half a mile long!

         Examining his foot he found it covered in a healthy layer of brown dirt, provided it could easily be wiped away with a single finger. More interesting to him however was the line of multi-colored dots glued to his foot in two neat little rows. Wanting to get a closer look at this strange pattern, he plopped down on the earth, able to feel the earth quake with a "THUD!" from the relatively benign movement. Squinting at the bottom of his sole Luke could only gasp with amazement as his size truly dawned him, the dots were actually the remains of a small town stuck to his sole. The slight layer of sweat present on the bottom of his foot having glued them to his skin. Another step and the remains of the buildings would have been obliterated completely, lost to the history of the new world that had dawned with Luke's growth. "I can crush entire towns under my feet! That's awesome!", Luke bellowed in excitement.

         Creating a minor earthquake, Luke leapt to his feet and began to jog across the countryside, aiming his 2700 foot long tread at any town or village that he could see. At Luke's height each stride could cover a mile and a half and the time it took for him to get from one town to another was measured in seconds. Towns, gas stations, freeways, anything that Luke could see was fair game and he loved the little crunches they made as they were crushed by his massive feet. After 5 minutes of non stop crushing, Luke had wiped out dozens of towns and killed thousands, but his rampage was just getting started.

         With another "Crunch!" another town was flattened by one of Luke's steps making him giggle as he felt the buildings flatten beneath him. Suddenly a red truck travelling along one of the many roads caught his eye, and he stepped forward ready to flatten it under his next footfall. But, he found something far more interesting in the corner of his eye. Turning his head, he found himself looking at a bustling city (the one he'd been originally headed towards in fact). Walking towards it, he took extreme care to make his steps as gentle as possible, not wanting to damage anything before he could get a look at it. Then as slowly as he possibly could, he lowered himself down onto the ground so that he could get a close look. Dozens of houses in neat little suburbs were crushed in an instant as his 3 mile long body landed on the fragile earth.

         With his face now "inches" from the city, Luke could make out the fine details. Cars, buses, signs, and even people all popped into view and Luke could even recognize a tall black building standing "tall" in the center of the city, he remembered his dad calling it "Willis Tower" or something like that. "Well if I'm supposed to be taking over the earth, I might as well start here!", Luke remarked. Standing back up to his full height, Luke took his first steps into the dense inner city. Most buildings were barely tall enough to see the tops of his massive feet and as a result did little more than add an entertaining crunch to the bottom of his step. Suddenly Luke was giggling (much to the horror of the cities residents) and he picked up his foot only to drop it right in front of his first step breaking into laughter. "That tickles!", he boomed and before the city knew what was happening Luke was crushing everything in sight.

But how much did Luke destroy?

122.content:
You and James (your friend) just came back from school after another boring day and went inside your house.

"I hate Mr Johnson" rages James "Another 3 pages of nothing to copy.." he went on.

"Yeah, can't wait to have my revenge on him eventually" you add.

Just then, your brother came from his room upstairs and shove you both out of his way "Out of my way, runts" he said rudely.

"Heyyy what's your problem" you yell at your bro.

"You, is my problem. You're small, I can do whatever I want, so until you have a growth spurt, you're not my equal, buzz off" he then jumped on the couch and fired his xbox360 away.

You, on the other hand, were feeling a warm tingling sensation throughout your body "Dude, you're growing" said James a bit freaked out "What?" .. "Yeah, you're growing" you watch as your surrounding sink lower and get smaller "Sweet, I'm getting taller" you smile. Just as fast as it came, it stopped at you being a head taller than your friend and about the same height as your bro.

"Whoa man, how did you do that" James was in complete awe.

"No idea, but I like it"
122.title: The feet of Aaron

"WHAT THE HELL" he yells, getting up in a fury. Turning around he was about to punch you but stopped when he saw your new size. "Dude, how did you get so tall" he wondered, a bit confused.

"I.. I don't know, it just happened"

"Bullshit, you must have done something, people don't just grow like that"

"Well.." you didn't know what to tell so you.. "I wished for it, I wished to get taller so I got taller" you lie to him.

"I need some fresh air" you and James quickly go outside without Dan noticing anything. Once out, you stretch your body "Haaa feels good to be taller" you say, putting your hands on your hips "Man, I hope I get another growth spurt like that" just then you feel the same tingling sensation as earlier.

You smile as you watch everything getting smaller again. For his part James watch as your head gets further up in the air and going away from him. "This is so cool" you say, as you stop just as your waist is level with James head. "Nice, I'm taller than my brother now, and you"

"H..how, things like that don't happen"

"You're just jealous man" you say, looking down at your tiny friend.

"No I'm not" he insist.

"Yes you are" you continue teasing "It's probably just my puberty kicking in"

"Puberty? That's crap man, no one has growth spurt like that" But you just grinned back at him as your body stretched up and up, finally leaving James knee high next to you.

"Dude, that's crazy" he said, looking up at your grinning face. "You're like.. becoming a giant" James was totally shocked.

You look around, enjoying the view of some neighbors giving you an odd look. "This is too awesome, people look small now, and they're gonna look even tinier if I have another growth spurt" just as you say that, you feel your body expanding again.

"Wait," James' said, "Shouldn't we try to figure out what happened to make you grow so fast?" "I've started going through puberty is all, now let's go!" James shakes his head knowing that puberty does not give you half a foot in seconds. The two of you make your way downstairs.

Even when he would go on the bus, not every single one of the students would ever want to give him a seat, and Matthew wished he should’ve either stayed at home or just take by car and head down on his own. But it was to be the only chance available for this trip, so he had sighed and had to sit right at the back, sitting there all on his own, and can only hear the students chattering right in front of him.

It wasn’t a pleasant journey, and it took half an hour until the class had made it to the Lab. All of them were off the bus, with Mathew coming out at the rear. They walked into the building and were been giving a tour guide in under supervision, so that neither the students would break away and do anything whatever pleases some.

The tour went smoothly, and Matthew would be able to enjoy some good machines and other chemicals while it lasts. However behind him were a couple of school bullies Matthew gets treated a lot. They had spotted this colourful looking ray gun that brought an idea to maybe use on a nerd from behind.

With sense of anticipation, one of them takes aim at Matthew and shoots him right at his back. This zapped him so suddenly, he felt a sudden shock before he can hear the laughters from the bullies behind with that ray gun being held by one of them.

“Hey, why did you do this to me?” Matthew asked in a horrified way.

“Why? Just so we can use these out of your expense, shorty!” One of the bullies replied, which a couple laughed as well as the rest of the students.

They can all laugh all they want, but it may be no laughing matter moments later, when Matthew was beginning to experience some weird feeling all over his body. He fears that he isn’t sure what can happen to him since he had been triggered by the ray gun. However, it wouldn’t take long to make an answer when what happen to him?
14521.title: It Was A Field Trip Day

145213.content: Suddenly Matt spouted up three inches! Did anybody notice
145213.title: Matthew Grows A Little Bit Taller

1452132.content:
Matt felt a sudden jolt he wasn't sure what it was, but he noticed that he had changed. He'd gotten taller! It didn't seem like anyone else noticed though. Matt wondered how this could have happened, but he was happy that it did. He was probably around average height now, no more being a shorty!

He wished he would grow again, and soon. Was his wish granted? If so, how much did he grow?
1452132.title: No

14522.content: Today, Matthew's teacher announced that there was going to be a science fair, and at this science fair, students would be working in groups. Matthew sighed, he knew that it would be hard for him to find a partner. Students were already mingling to find someone to use for their project, and Matthew was too awkward to ask anyone.. Thankfully, there was one student left and it was...
14522.title: He had a science project to do with a partner

choices: The boys grow while in the bathroom and Tyler reveals he has a crush on Matthew!
They grow while they walk to the bathroom!
145221.content:
Even though there was a kid left over, it was unfortunately a bully, Tyler. But something was different and strange about him, he picked on him when teachers were around, but when they were alone like in the hallway or in the bathroom, he just stood there and looked at him smiling, as if he had a thing for Matthew and Matthew was into boys and he did feel strange around Tyler as if he had a thing for him too, but he kept it a secret to avoid pounding or an embarrassment! Matthew was not totally thrilled about working with him, but he knew talking to the teacher would not do shit!

“Move over squirt and lets get this over with”, Tyler shouted and pushed him. “Here we go again”, Matthew thought to himself. The teacher instructions were to mix some chemicals and make a red liquid. This should have been a easy process but unfortunately instead of taking it slow, Tyler was pouring all the chemicals in at once! “No!” Matthew shouted, but it was to late the red liquid on their beaker bubbled and exploded all over them, they were covered in liquid.The whole class laughed at them! The teacher was furious and told them to wash us in the bathroom and go to the principals office! Matthew sighed and Tyler groaned but when they left the class room, Tyler started to smile that same smile at Matthew again but Matthew was to upset to notice it.
145221.title: Tyler, a Bully
